attributes.action: Make Veterinary Surgeons more accountable for their actions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we believe that the current royal college of veterinary surgeons' procedure requires modernisation and is not in line with those available to other professional bodies. 

we as pet owners demand greater accountability on the part of veterinary surgeons, greater transparency within the current regime and more robust sanctions available to the royal college of veterinary surgeons in cases where vets are deemed negligent. 

we also demand that the revised disciplinary procedures include the ability of the rcvs to financially compensate owners in cases where the vet has been proved to have acted outside of established procedures.
